name: Divine Stone
description:
Divine Stone is a 2D platformer puzzle game in which you have to find answers to riddles that will definitely make you brainwash. In addition, time constraints and a variety of opponents will become an obstacle on your way.

You have to go room after room in order to achieve your goal - to snatch your loved ones from the clutches of the mysterious kidnapper and, along the way, reveal his identity, solving the riddle of this strange place.

What awaits you in this game:


• Non-linear plot
• 6 different endings
• 6 unique bosses
• Lots of entertaining puzzles
• Multidimensional gameplay
• Mysterious atmosphere and relaxing musical accompaniment

The choice is yours!
